relation: Darrow - #34 Enemies appear to ruin the journey, but fortunately for Ness, tiny insects are rarely much of a threat.
Darrow - #35 Climbing to the top of Giant Step is simple enough, but that's only the beginning. Titanic Ant blocks the way, leaving Ness with only one option - pray he's as weak as his minions.
Darrow - #36 Titanic Ant proves to be all too powerful for close quarter combat. Perhaps Ness should consider growing another pair of arms.
Darrow - #37 Ness attempts a last ditch effort to win the fight...and promptly fails. That's one heck of a throw, though.

Darrow - #38 Remembering Picky's motto, Ness suddenly awakens to a new possiblity. Remember, when a young main hero is at the end of his ropes, a special skill will always save him at the last minute!
textBeforeTable: > T P O I F D C A < Other Submissions by Darrow With great power...comes great backpain. Captain Strong shows his age and the battle comes to an end. Ness, content with his victory, proceeds onto Twoson and the chapter of Onett comes to a close. Also, a cameo by yours truly as the mysterious Check-a-roony guy.
